text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡتُمۡ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ نَرَى ٱللَّهَ جَهۡرَةٗ فَأَخَذَتۡكُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

translation.en: And [recall] when you said, "O Moses, we will never believe you until we see Allah outright"; so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on
translation.id: Dan (ingatlah) ketika kamu berkata, "Wahai Musa! Kami tidak akan beriman kepadamu sebelum kami melihat Allah dengan jelas," maka halilintar menyambarmu, sedang kamu menyaksikannya
